channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20899] Keytab URI for LLAP YARN Service is restrictive to support HDFS only
item.description: llap-server/src/main/resources/package.py restricts the keytab URI to support HDFS only and hence fails for other FileSystem API conforming FSs like s3a, wasb, gs, etc.
item.summary: Keytab URI for LLAP YARN Service is restrictive to support HDFS only

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Tested this patch in a hadoop cluster based on branch-3.1
/cc thejas. Post review it should be committed to branch-3 and master.

+1 overall

ATTACHMENT ID: 12947860 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Wouldn't this break backward compat for paths specified the old way? We can check the path for being the full URI and append if it's not. +-0

sershe not to worry. This will not cause any backward incompatibility. Any store conforming to hadoop FS API will work, including relative paths based on fs.defaultFS value. In fact, if you look at history including Slider - these 2 lines of code did not even exist. It was added only recently due to the constraint that YARN Service imposed to support hdfs and file URIs only, which now has been removed with YARN-9002.
Committed to master and branch-3. Thanks gsaha for the patch!
